revised_title: Refractive Indices of Gaseous Nitric Oxide, Sulphur Dioxide, and Sulphur Trioxide
tldr: The authors investigate the refractive indices of gaseous nitric oxide, sulphur dioxide, and sulphur trioxide, finding that their refractivities deviate significantly from the additive values. The study provides insights into the behavior of nitrogen and sulfur compounds in the gas phase and contributes to the understanding of their refractive properties.
